name: Rocket Panda
storyline: The evil Biscuit Head has invaded Biscuit Land, home of not just Rocket Panda but his small furry band of Badgers as well. The Badgers have been kidnapped and a menagerie of enemies have taken over the land and it’s up to Rocket Panda to deftly fly to the rescue!
summary: Enter a thrilling journey to save Biscuit Land from the clutches of the wicked Biscuit Head! Join Rocket Panda and his loyal band of Badgers as they take flight to rescue their kidnapped comrades and reclaim their homeland.

videos.name: Launch Trailer
videos.title: Rocket Panda Launch Trailer -  A Delicious Rocket Adventure for Sega Genesis
